overview:
New Media executive and former educator with over 10 years of business development, product development, and online marketing experience in youth and gaming sectors . Served as GM for Yahoo!’s kids and education properties before joining Kaboose as VP of Kids and Education, and then as VP of Business Development. Helped launch two youth focused MMOs, Minyanland.com at Kaboose and more recently with Emerald Island at Fluid Entertainment where he served as VP of Product Marketing.

Jason holds a Bachelors degree from UCLA and a teaching certificate from the University of San Diego.
